content.description: Magazine advertisement from 1924Courtesy of Duke University Libraries Digital Collections
content.question: Expanding popular culture during the period of the advertisement was most directly accompanied by which of the following changes?

choices.label: The federal government relaxed previous restrictions on immigration.
Civil rights activists achieved some legal victories over segregation.
Social tensions intensified over gender roles, race, and modern values.
Liberalism reached a high point of acceptance in national politics.

content.answer: Social tensions intensified over gender roles, race, and modern values.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
